reviews.review: gosto do jogo e dos gráficos, só poderia ter um sistema anti-cheat mais eficiente.

Rating: 1/5
After almost 1500 hours invested in this game i have come to a conclusion that this is one of the most unhealthy game i ever played. I have not only played this game for almost 1500 hours but ive easily consumed content like videos and watched matches for a 1000 hours. I regret spending this much time, money and energy on this game. If i had spent the time i wasted on this game in a more productive manner im sure that i would have been in a happier state of mind and would have been more succesful. If anyone wants to start grinding and wants to get good on this game for whatever reason or if u just want to play time game for the first time I WOULD LIKE TO ADVISE U TO SPEND YOUR TIME ELSEWHERE. The devs do not care about their own game. The only reason i have rated this game 1 instead of 0 is because ive made decent friends through this game and have bonded with some of my existing friends better. Also the kz and surfing aspects and the community servers are the only good part about this game. Whats truly sad is that even though i hate the game this much im pretty sure that i will be continuing to play this game because im additcted to it. If u had expected constructive criticism about this game then this is a wrong comment for u to read, this is just a rant about this game.
Im sorry about the typos and grammatical errors. English is not my first language.
Ебал рот этой игры, что не катка в мм то либо читак либо в тиме уебаны, если захотели начать играть в эту помойку, даже не скачивай!!!
Игра плохая, ты можешь зайти в соревновательный режим и тебя кикнут 4 игрока в конце катки которые вместе играют и тебе дадут бан на 2 часа очень хорошая игра

Do not play this game. The community is more toxic than a nuclear waste dump. I've been called stupid for picking up the wrong gun. I've been kicked for not surrendering when there was 2 rounds left. I've played against entire teams of smurfs. I've played with entire teams of complete a-holes. The game itself can be frustrating, but Valve keeps updates going and adding content to it. Do not play this game if you want to have a good time. If the community drives someone who has 500 hours in a game away, there's an issue.
